about.aboutEnglish: The Walgama Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Company was founded in 1952 by Indigenous  Doctor Mr.M.D.P.Rupathunga.Various ayurvedic oils,Tinctures, Āsava,Panta as well as ayurvedic drug products that cure specific diseases are produced by us. For this purpose local and imported quality herbal ingredients are used and more than 143 pharmaceuticals are currently in production and distribution.As a private company since 2012 the productions are carried out in conformity with the Sri Lanka Standards Institution (SLSI).

products.name: Brungaraja Oil
products.ingedients: False Daisy, Indian gooseberry, Asparagus racemosus,Fresh Milk, Babila
products.bestFor: Promotes a healthy Instous head of hair.Prevents premature greying and hair loss.
products.suggestedUse: Oil Must be applied in to your scalp and give a gentle massaging  for few minutes.

products.name: Krimi Karal
products.bestFor: Best For- All kinds of stomach complaints such as Nausia , Flatulence, Stomach ache, Indigestion, Vomiting
products.suggestedUse: For below 12 years children, due to worm diseases when seen following symptoms, such as; Anorexia, Continuous crying, Nausia, Bite of teeth, Thirst, Weakness, Stools of partial digested food, Flatulence, Stomach ache, Indigestion, Vomiting, Diarrhoea etc. Can given with following methord according to the ages, added with Coffee drink or Lime juice with little quantity of sugar.  •	Below 5 years - 01pill (once or twice)  •	Over 5 years - 02 pills (once or twice) •	To keep healthyness, given once a week,-twice morning and evening. For all kinds of stomach complaints of adults-3 pills taken (given) with Coffee drink, Lime juice or Ginger juice.

products.name: Mulabada Samanaya
products.ingedients: Chebulic myrobalan,ground neem,katukarosana,indian patcholi No alcohol and preservatives added No side effect is reported,can be used while using any other medicines
products.suggestedUse: For adults-3 tablespoons  For children-1 tablespoon Three times per day after meals(shke the bottle before use)

products.name: Vatha Widuranga Oil
products.ingedients: Babila (Sida cordifolia), Asamodhagam (Apium graveolens) & Sesame oil
products.bestFor: Paralysis,disease due to vitiated Raktha(Blood) & Pitta,wounds, Joints pain due to fractures.
products.suggestedUse: Warm oil if desired. Apply to the target joints and muscles, massaging the area until the oil is mostly absorbed. Repeat 2–3 times daily or as needed.

products.name: Shulahara Oil
products.bestFor: Muscular pains in the chest and limbs. joint pains, contusion and sprains.
products.suggestedUse: Apply to the Target joints and muscles,massaging the area until the oil is mostly absorbed.Repeat 2-3 times daily or as needed.

products.name: Mahanarayana Oil
products.ingedients: Rhizome of Hathavariya (Asparagus racemosus), Dashamul & Sesame oil
products.bestFor: Paralysis, Head ailments, Muscles & joints pain due to Vata dosha. Ingredients- Rhizome of Hathavariya (Asparagus racemosus), Dashamul & Sesame oil
products.suggestedUse: Warm oil if desired. Apply to the target joints and muscles, massaging the area until the oil is mostly absorbed. Repeat 2–3 times daily or as needed. Daily can be used for body massage & used for Nasya, Drink & Enema as directed by the physician.

products.name: Gugguladi oil
products.ingedients: Pure Castor oil,Guggul,Natural Viniger and Lime juice
products.bestFor: Vericose,Arthritis,Knee pain, Back pain,Relives tight & soremuscles,Relives Joint stifness and all Vata dosha based pain.
products.suggestedUse: Apply to the Target joints and muscles,massaging the area until the oil is mostly absorbed.Repeat 2-3 times daily or as needed.
